title.en: Kanojo ni Uwaki Sareteita Ore ga, Koakuma na Kouhai ni Natsukareteimasu

altTitles.ja: カノジョに浮気されていた俺が、小悪魔な後輩に懐かれています

altTitles.en: I Was Cheated On by My Girlfriend, but My Devilish Junior Now Yearns for Me
My Coquettish Junior Attaches Herself to Me!

altTitles.ru: Девушка изменила мне с другим, и теперь моя дьяволёнок-кохай пристаёт ко мне

altTitles.vi: Sau khi bị bạn gái lừa, một tiểu quỷ khoá dưới cứ bám theo tôi.

description.en:
Christmas season.

Hasegawa Yuuta found himself single after breaking up last month when his girlfriend had cheated on him. And it was only a few days until Christmas! After an everyday conversation with his female friend, Mino Ayaka, Yuuta met a beautiful girl clad in a Santa suit—In a lane full of couples no less! Her name was Shinohara Mayu. Will this encounter with Shinohara turn out to be the Christmas present for Yuuta?
description.ja: クリスマス直前に彼女に浮気された大学二年・羽瀬川悠太。 意気消沈する彼の前に、サンタの格好をした美少女後輩・志乃原真由が現れる！ グイグイ来る彼女は、次第に家にまで上がり込むようになり…！？
description.ru: Однажды за несколько дней до Рождества, молодой Хасегава Юта тяжело расстался со своей бывшей девушкой, которая ему изменила. После повседневного диалога со своей давней подругой Мино Аякой, Юта встретил красивую во всех смысла слова девушку по имени Маю Шиномия, одетую в костюм Санты. Неужели внезапная встреча с кокетливой красоткой станет рождественским подарком для Юты?
description.pt-br:
Época natalina.
Yuuta Hasegawa ficou solteiro após terminar o namoro no mês passado, quando sua namorada o traiu. E faltam apenas alguns dias para o Natal!
Após uma conversa casual com sua amiga Ayaka Mino, Yuuta encontra uma linda garota vestida de Papai Noel - justamente em uma rua cheia de casais! Seu nome era Mayu Shinohara.
Será que esse encontro com Shinohara vai se tornar o presente de Natal para Yuuta?

title.en: Kaibutsu-tachi wo Suberu Mono - Saikyou no Shien Tokka Nouryoku de, Kizukeba Sekai Saikyou Party ni!

altTitles.ja: 怪物たちを統べるモノ 最強の支援特化能力で、気付けば世界最強パーティーに！

altTitles.en: The Boy Who Rules the Monsters

description.en: Black Tiger is a party of five young prodigy adventurers hailed as the Miracle Children across the land. Yet, among them, Sol Rock stood apart from the rest. Branded as a worthless support mage and treated like a mere expendable grunt. One day, after completing their promotion quest, he was told he wasn’t strong enough to keep up and was kicked out. What they didn’t know was that Sol Rock possessed the greatest power of all: the “Player,” a godlike talent that allows him to buff his allies and dominate the battlefield. Now, cast out and alone, Sol Rock is determined to prove his worth. He sets out to gather the strongest group the world has ever seen!
description.ja:
『奇跡の子』が集った、新進気鋭の天才冒険者パーティー『黒虎』。偉業を成し遂げるそのパーティーで、ソル・ロックは『雑用』と揶揄され唯一頼りない支援術士と思われていた。５人で討伐を終えたある日ーーソルは『力不足』だと仲間に告げられ、そのままパーティーから追放されてしまう。

しかし…ソルの本当の能力『プレイヤー』は、『仲間』に強力なジョブやスキルを与え、超強化する神の如き最強の力だった！追放されたソルは、最強の支援特化能力で最強のパーティーを作り上げるべく動き出し…？

altTitles.ja: ナノ魔神

description.en:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.  

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w)
---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/nanomasin/list?title_no=2085)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/moutianchengweimoshen/list?title_no=1519)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2194)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000948)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2171)
description.fr: La vie remplit d'infortune et d'épreuve de Cheo Yeo-Woon, bâtard et dernier dans l'ordre de succession, prit un tournant après qu'un de ses « descendant » venant du futur ait injecté des Nano Machines dans son corps.
description.id:
Setelah mengalami cobaan berat pada hidupnya, Tiba tiba Chun yeowun mendapatkan pertolongan tidak terduga dari keturunannya di masa depan yang memasukkan teknologi nano ke dalam tubuhnya! Mampukah Chun Yeowun menjadi master bela diri dengan menggunakan kekuatan nano mashin!?

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w)
---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/nanomasin/list?title_no=2085)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/moutianchengweimoshen/list?title_no=1519)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2194)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000948)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2171)
description.ja:
「未来の力を手に入れ、邪悪な魔教に立ち向かう！」 魔教の私生児として生まれた主人公・天黎雲。 幼い頃から卑しまれ、後継者争いで命を狙われる。 死に物狂いの抵抗もむなしく、危うく命を落としかねない絶体絶命のピンチに･･･！ その瞬間、突如現れた謎の男から「ナノマシン」と呼ばれる未来の力を注入され、 目覚めるととてつもない力を手に入れていた。 魔教を超え、最強の武人を目指す天黎雲の物語が幕を開ける！

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w)
---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/nanomasin/list?title_no=2085)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/moutianchengweimoshen/list?title_no=1519)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2194)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000948)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2171)
description.ko:
갖은 멸시와 목숨의 위협을 받던 마교의 사생아 천여운, 
미래에서 나타난 후손이 천여운의 몸에 나노 머신을 주입한 후 그의 인생이 송두리째 바뀐다.
마교를 넘어 무림 최고의 자리에 오르기 위한 천여운의 거침없는 이야기가 시작된다!

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w)
---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/nanomasin/list?title_no=2085)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/moutianchengweimoshen/list?title_no=1519)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2194)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000948)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2171)
description.ru:
Чен Еун — незаконнорожденный принц, появившийся на свет без единой частички Нейгуна. С самого раннего детства он находился под гнетом всеобщего отвращения. Весь забитый, с отсутствием какой-либо мотивации, год за годом Еун влачил свое жалкое существование. Ни на что не рассчитывая... и не претендуя.

Будучи изгоем, исконно презираемым шестью великими кланами, в один прекрасный день он оказался в окружении десятка подосланных убийц. Когда глаза практически застлала пелена белого света... и казалось, он уже начал теряться, проваливаясь в пучину... безграничного отчаяния, на горизонте возникла еле заметная фигура.

Неизвестный "потомок", снизошедший из будущего, в мгновение ока уничтожил всех врагов. Прошептав нечто невнятное, он подсадил в тело нашего героя какой-то странный предмет... наномашину. С этого момента все кардинально переменилось. Поселившийся где-то внутри искусственный интеллект дал его жизни невероятный толчок.

Больше не будет как прежде. Это... новая ветвь истории. Истории о парне, который бросил вызов небесам.
description.th:
เรื่องราวของชอนยออุนลูกนอกสมรสภายในพรรคมารที่ได้เป็นเทวบุตรมารรุ่นที่ 2 และอยู่เหนือประมุขพรรคมาร

description.zh:
无名小卒却有了神秘机器，
或许我也能挑战一下魔神？
魔教私生子天如运饱受蔑视和生命威胁，某天来自未来的后人突然出现，给天如运的身体注入了纳米机器，从此他的人生发生了翻天覆地的变化。

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w)

description.pt-br: Depois de ser desdenhado e ter sua vida em perigo, Cheon Yeo-Woon, um órfão do culto demoníaco, recebeu uma visita inesperada de seu descendente do futuro, que inseriu nele uma micro máquina, que mudou drasticamente a vida de Cheon Yeo-Woon após sua ativação. A história da jornada de Cheon Yeo-Woon no culto demoníaco e sua subida para se tornar o melhor nas artes marciais acabou de começar.
description.zh-hk:
在魔教少教主候選人中排名最後的天如運，是個運氣極差的人。 某天，來自未來的後代突然穿越時空出現，並且將奈米機器注入他的身體，徹底翻轉了他的人生。

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w)
---

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

title.en: Bunkei no Kimi, Rikei no Anata

altTitles.en: The Union of the Literary You and the Scientific Me

altTitles.ja: 文系のきみ、理系のあなた

description.en:
Winner of the 30rd Comic Awards Jade Prize.
Published in Yurihime June 2024, pages 575-595.

altTitles.ja: Dr.スランプ

altTitles.th: ดร.สลัมกับหนูน้อยอาราเล่

description.en:
When goofy inventor Senbei Norimaki creates a precocious robot named Arale, his masterpiece turns out to be more than he bargained for!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/dr-slump)
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2022)


---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen/Shojo in 1982**

title.en: My Younger Sister Was a Genius

altTitles.en: My Younger Sibling Was a Genius

description.en: Yoon Hajoon, who struggled to pursue his musical career despite his iffy talents and ended up sacrificing his own family along the way, " If only I could turn back time...! " One day, after living with regrets and alcohol for a while, he woke up and found himself had returned to the past. Just then, it dawned on him. The fact that my younger sister is a musical genius...! Now is the time to turn my life around, that is by producing my younger sister into becoming the best singer!

altTitles.ja: 見切りから始める我流剣術

description.en: Rio, a boy living in a remote village, attends the village dojo for self-defense, but gives up the idea that he cannot become stronger under the dojo’s teaching methods. However, the village is a dangerous place, and Rio decides to create his own way of fighting – “Garyu Kenjutsu” – in order to survive! A royal road fantasy of swords and magic is about to begin!

altTitles.ja: はんなりギロリの頼子さん

description.en: The manga follows Shindou Yoriko, a 29-year-old Kyoto cigarette shop owner who has a sharp look in her eyes but is actually a kind-hearted person. It may not come across, but she truly loves the city of Kyoto, and is willing to give up some of her time to share that love with tourists and other visitors (as long as they don't get on her nerves).
description.pt-br: Shindou Yoriko, um dono de uma loja de cigarros Kyoto de 29 anos que tem um olhar penetrante, mas na verdade é uma pessoa de bom coração. Pode não parecer, mas ela realmente ama a cidade de Kyoto e está disposta a abrir mão de parte de seu tempo para compartilhar esse amor com turistas e outros visitantes (desde que não a irritem).

altTitles.ja: ジュリアインザボックス!

description.en:
The game has turned into reality and the Great Migration has occurred all over the Earth. As a top-tier ranker thanks to massive in-game purchases, along with the special privileges from the game administrator Nel, I got a new lease on life. I even inherited the inventory of my max-level game character as it was prior to the game shutting down.

 From cash items that no one else can acquire, to special items of legendary grade that everyone desires! Now, everything that everyone wants unfolds infinitely within my inventory. 

Please, let it be known to only you! My inventory is… abnormal.

Even if a musician dies, he never dies. It's just covered. Singer-songwriter Kim Han-seok, who became a legend in Korea with just a guitar... Waking up as a college student in the streaming era 30 years after his death!

altTitles.ja: ラブかライクか分からない！

altTitles.en: I Don't Know if it's Love or Like!

title.en: Mori de Seijo o Hirotta Saikyou no Kyuuketsu-hime ~Musume no Tamenara Kuni de Moassari Horoboshimasu!~ @COMIC

altTitles.ja: 森で聖女を拾った最強の吸血姫～娘のためなら国でもあっさり滅ぼします！～@COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Mori de Seijo wo Hirotta Saikyou no Kyuuketsu-hime ~Musume no Tamenara Kuni de Moassari Horoboshimasu!~ @COMIC

altTitles.en: The Strongest Vampire Princess Who Found and Adopted the Baby Saint in the Forest: I'll Even Destroy a Country for My Daughter! @COMIC

description.en:
The True Ancestor Angelica, feared by the world under the alias of "the Vampire Princess Who Burns Kingdoms," has once again burned an entire country with her magic today. The reason for this is... "M-Mama!" Was it for the sake of her unbearably cute daughter?! 
 
After picking up a human baby in the forest and raising her, Angelica was knocked out by her soft, pudgy skin and innocent purity, untouched by corruption. Gone was the cold-hearted killer who easily took lives, replaced by a doting mother enjoying a life of extreme affection. 
 
One day, the foolish king, aiming to kidnap her daughter, Pearl, who was actually a special "Saint," hatched a scheme. Naturally, this incited Angelica's wrath! The word "mercy" was forgotten by "Mama," who would destroy any enemy, using even the most cruel means! 
 
A cheat-level, overpowered vampire princess rampages in a dark fantasy driven by love and parental affection!
 
___
**Character Designer:** [Yoshimoto](https://mangadex.org/author/212b80e5-09a9-47ea-8da0-9064f16815fb)
description.ja:
『国陥としの吸血姫』という異名で恐れられる真祖・アンジェリカは、今日もひとつの国を魔法で燃やし尽くした。
その理由とは――
「マ――マ――！」
かわいすぎる娘のためだった!?
森で拾った人間の赤ちゃんを連れ帰り育てるうちに、ぷにぷにお肌や穢れを知らない純粋さにノックアウト。
平気で人殺しをする冷酷さはどこへやらで、デレデレ溺愛ライフを過ごしていた。
そんなある日、実は「聖女」という特別な存在であった娘・パールを狙い、愚かな国王が誘拐計画をしかけてきた。
これには当然怒り心頭！
容赦という言葉を忘れた「ママ」は、どんな残酷な手を使ってでも敵を殲滅する！

チートな最強吸血姫が愛ゆえに大暴れ!?
親バカダークファンタジー！

title.en: Sore wa Rei no Shiwaza desu

altTitles.en: It's the work of the Ghost

altTitles.ja: それは霊のしわざです

altTitles.th: รักนี้ผีจัดให้

description.en: My name is Torii Nozomu, a plain introvert. Suddenly a new transfer student, Kirishima Kyoko, sits next to me. She's cute, kind, and for some reason she proactively talks to me, even though I'm a nerd! A true saint. Yet I want to get involved with her as little as possible because she's haunted by a "ghost" that only I can see! She's a little naughty, extremely pure and, in some cases, horrifying! Will I ever find a way to handle her?
description.fr: Je m'appelle Torii Nozomi. Un jour, une nouvelle fille est arrivée dans ma classe. Elle est très jolie, mais le problème c'est qu'elle est suivie par un fantôme (très taquin) que je suis le seul à voir !
description.ja: 地味で目立たない陰キャな僕、鳥居望(とりいのぞむ)。そんな僕の隣に席に転校生の霧島京子(きりしまきょうこ）ちゃんがやってきた。可愛くて優しくて、なぜか陰キャな僕にも積極的に話しかけてくれる「ぐう聖」な京子ちゃん！…だけど僕はなるべく彼女にかかわりたくない。だって、彼女には僕にだけ見える“霊”が憑いてるんだ！！！！――ちょっとエッチで、とびきりピュアで、ところによりホラー！？

description.en: In the Immortal Realm, Jinyul was renowned as the Beauty Immortal, leading fashion trends and styles as the personal barber of the Jade Emperor. However, he, who was (literally) intoxicated by his high status, behaved recklessly and caused a major accident, completely shaving off the Jade Emperor’s hair. Enraged, the Jade Emperor banished him to the Mortal Realm. After falling into the Mortal Realm, Jinyul planned to regain his prowess and return to the Immortal Realm once again. But the moment he landed, things started going awry! Can Jinyul regain his status and return to his rightful place in the Immortal Realm?

altTitles.ja: 魔物喰らいの冒険者

description.en: Rude is an adventurer who makes a living by collecting medicinal herbs in dungeons filled with miasma, relying on his unique skill of “abnormal status nullification.” Because of this, other adventurers avoid him because he smells like miasma, and he cannot form a party, so he is derided as a “miasma diver.” Then, a new labyrinth is discovered, and Rude is invited to join a party that needs him as a baggage carrier. In order to change the situation, he challenges the labyrinth. However, after encountering a powerful monster in the labyrinth, the adventurers who accompanied him betray Rude and are abandoned as a decoy… After a life-or-death battle with the monster, he is injured, loses all his supplies, and is in a desperate situation. With the monster’s corpse lying before him, Rude tries to survive by gambling on the forbidden “monster food”… The more he eats, the stronger he becomes. This is the start of an exciting gourmet adventure fantasy!
description.ja: 「状態異常無効化」というユニークスキルを頼りに、瘴気で満ちるダンジョンで薬草を採取して生計を立てている冒険者のルード。それ故に他の冒険者達からは瘴気臭いと避けられパーティーを組む事も出来きず、「瘴気漁り」という蔑称で蔑まれる毎日。そんな時、新たな迷宮が見つかり、荷物持ちとして必要としてくれるパーティーに誘われたルードは、現状を変えるべくこの迷宮に挑戦する。だが、迷宮の中で強力な魔物と遭遇したことで、同行した冒険者たちはルードを裏切り、囮として見捨てられるのだった…。魔物との死闘を経て、怪我をし、物資も失い、絶体絶命の極限状況に陥ったルードは、目の前に横たわる魔物の死体を前に、生き延びるために禁断の〝魔物食″に賭けてみるが──…。喰えば喰うほど強くなる、痛快グルメ冒険ファンタジー開幕!!

description.en: Lee Gijeok Physical Therapist. The center is failing, and my girlfriend is drifting away…! On a day when nothing goes right, after being hit by a falling star, a status window appears?! This is a story of a self-centered Man becoming the best physical therapist!

altTitles.ja: ふたり生徒会

description.en:
What do you do when your student council doesn't have enough members to fill all the positions? Well, take most of them on your own, of course!  
  
Seishirou Watari is a middle school student and has the roles of student council president / secretary / treasurer / general affairs officer, and he's accompanied by Ryouko Mizutani, his vice president. Together they, well… make do with whatever little they have. What do you want? It's only the two of them, okay!?

altTitles.ja: 大巨蟲列島

altTitles.en: The Even Bigger Island of Giant Insects
The Island of Giant Insects, Die

description.en: New enemies, new bugs and an even bigger island.
description.ja: 辰野神島へと脱出した睦美たちは天空を制圧するトンボに追いつめられる!
description.vi: Mutsumi và những người bạn của cô đã thành công đến được đảo Tatsuno Oshima, nơi mà người dân vẫn đang vui vẻ tổ chức lễ hội... Và rồi đúng như những gì Mutsumi đã đoán trước những con côn trùng khổng lồ đã bắt đầu âm thầm tấn công người dân. Để tránh thảm kịch như các hòn đảo trước thì Mutsumi và các bạn của cô sẽ làm gì đây?

description.en: What happens when a girl from a quaint and small town meets the son of a Yakuza crime lord? Will she be able to change him for the better or will he continue down the dangerous and violent path?

title.en: Putting My Life on the Line, I Go All-in on Luck Enhancement

altTitles.ja: 人生かけて運強化に全振り

altTitles.en: Maxing Out Luck: The Ultimate Life Reroll
Spending My Whole Life Improving My Luck

description.en:
Amano Kyouhei was a man abandoned by luck, but after hitting rock bottom, his fate finally begins to change. After a video of him defeating a monster goes viral on the internet, he becomes famous overnight.
This sudden reversal of fortune leads Kyouhei on a lifechanging journey of unforetold adventures. Will this stroke of luck bring him to true fortune, or will he face new trials to overcome…? The answer to that question will be found in his upcoming journey!

altTitles.ja: グッド・ドクター

description.en:
The main character, Park Si-on, suffers from autism and savant syndrome.
With his innate genius like two sides of the same coin, he enters a pediatric surgery resident at a university hospital.
The prejudice of being a doctor with autism and the battle for power in the hospital are getting more and more dangerous...!
Will I ever be able to become a real doctor?

---

- Based on 2013 K-drama of the same name
description.ko:
몸은 29살, 마음은 9살. 자폐증과 서번트 증후군을 앓고 있는 주인공 박시온.
동전의 양면처럼 타고난 천재성을 가지고 대학병원 소아외과 레지던트로 들어가게 된다.
자폐증을 앓는 의사라는 편견과 병원 안에서 벌어지는 세력 싸움 속에서 점점 위태로워지는데..!
과연 진짜 의사가 될 수 있을까?

altTitles.ja: 冒険者ギルドの万能アドバイザー

description.en: Red is an ex-adventurer who was once the driving force in managing his party. He took care of all the busywork, such as dealing with guild requests and supplies for their adventures. Eventually, the hero declared that he was useless in battle and forcefully expelled him from the party. Having everything taken away from him, he spent his time frequenting a guild's tavern. Eventually, a young adventurer who was in trouble was saved by Red, and she begged him to take her on as an apprentice. As time went on, he realized that he had potential in training adventurers. He decided that his true calling was to be a teacher! This is a story about a jack of all trades instructor and his versatile students that will eventually become legendary adventurers who will take down the Demon King.

title.en: Meshitaki Onna ni Yakuza no Ai wa Omosugiru

altTitles.ja: 飯炊き女にヤクザの愛は重すぎる

description.en: Nanao Shindo, a office worker, happens to cook for her neighbor. However, it turns out to be a hangout for yakuzas! The yakuzas love the taste of her cooking, and Nanao becomes a favorite of the yakuzas. The yakuza gang leader, Ren Kazama, sees her and begins to love her...? This kind of love is too heavy!
description.ja: この溺愛[ロマンス]は、最高に危険。　愛されたら、逃げられない。「七緒 俺のもんになれ」20連勤をこなす限界社畜ＯＬの新藤七緒はたまの休日に料理をしては幸せをかみしめる平穏な生活を送っていた。しかし極悪非道なヤクザの組長 風間蓮に見初められたことで、七緒の人生は一変する！　部下や女にも情け容赦なく冷酷な蓮。けれど七緒への接し方だけは甘々なようで……？ スリルと笑いと銃が入り乱れる極道的非日常。こんな愛情、重すぎる！

altTitles.ja: 英雄機関

description.en: In a near-future where humanity stands on the edge of extinction, we turn our gaze to the stars. But in the depths of space, a new menace looms—the 'Star Beasts.' To combat these creatures, warriors donning mechanical armor emerge as humanity's last hope. Prepare yourself for a groundbreaking mecha action saga, where breathtaking visuals meet an expansive universe. The battle for survival starts now!
description.pt-br: Em um futuro próximo onde a humanidade beira a extinção, passamos a olhar as estrelas. Mas, na vastidão do espaço, uma nova ameaça surge - as Feras Estelares. Para combater essas criaturas, guerreiros utilizando armaduras mecânicas emergem como a última esperança da humanidade. Prepare-se para uma saga de ação mecha insana, onde visuais de tirar o fôlego encontram um vasto universo. A batalha pela sobrevivência começa agora!

altTitles.ja: おっぱい百合アンソロジー

altTitles.en: The Secret Kiss Should Be On The Breasts
Being Taught By A JK About The Joys Of One's Gender Who's In Their 30's

description.en:
A yuri anthology focused on boobs!  
More than a dozen of wonderful authors bringing you some ecchi and funny boob-centric yuri stories!  

Cover: [Konbu Wakame](https://mangadex.org/author/580a9899-14f8-4ef6-a156-bcf1ed53e119)
Illustration: Kagawa Yuusaku

**Chapters**:
1. **The Secret Kiss Should Be On The Breasts** by Kurou
2. **I've Become An Adult, Right?** by Hachiko
3. **Being Taught By A JK About The Joys Of One's Gender Who's In Their 30's** by Endo
4. **Drunk Oppai Discussion** by Kanro Ame
5. **Luring Bloom** by Majoccoid
6. **Intense Boobs Discourse** by Homura Subaru
7. **Senpai And Me** by Hisagi
8. **Oppai ≤ You** by Kisaragi Mizu & Doggy
9. **Love Breasts** by Yuino Chiri
10. **Forest of Flower Garden** by Kanda Dan
11. **Oppai Facts** by Guu
12. **The Student Council's Idle Talk** by Itou Hachi

altTitles.ja: 神絵師のおしごと
いえない秘密の愛し方

altTitles.en: How To Love: A Secret That Cannot Be Told

altTitles.zh-ro: Wúfǎ gào rén de mìmì àihào

description.en: High School teacher Saeki Nao is secretly a hardcore otaku who loves yuri manga. One day, at a doujinshi convention they participate in, Nao is eager to convey her feelings to "Nyapoleon", an artist she worships. However, it turned out to be a girl from her school, Kurumizawa Haruka, and moreover, she had to help her. After the event, they decided to go out for a meal, at Haruka's suggestion... When she wakes up in the morning, there is Haruka in the bed...?!
description.ja: 高校教師・佐伯和緒は密かに百合漫画を愛するオタク女子。ある日、参加した同人誌即売会で、崇拝する絵師「にゃポレオン」に想いを伝えようと意気込む和緒。だがそこにいたのは…!?
description.pt-br:
Kazuo Saeki, uma professora do ensino médio, é uma otaku que ama secretamente produtos yuri.
Um dia, em um evento de venda doujinshi do qual ela participou, Kazuo estava entusiasmada para transmitir seus pensamentos ao autor “Nyapoleon”.
Mas quem ela encontrou lá foi…

description.en: A place where you casually use blood or ma in your name, I lived in Murim for 7 years. I was miserable, and I did a lot of dirty things. But I had to do anything to survive. That's 'Nangin' Finally, I crossed the line and experienced death in a desire to become stronger. But when I opened my eyes, it was modern. The world has changed and we are connected to the fantasy world of Pangea?! And as a returner with the only class? Let's scratch the lottery tickets!
description.id: Tempat di mana Anda dengan santai menggunakan darah atau ma atas nama Anda, saya tinggal di Murim selama 7 tahun. Saya sengsara, dan saya melakukan banyak hal kotor. Tapi aku harus melakukan apapun untuk bertahan hidup. Itulah 'Nangin' Akhirnya, saya melewati batas dan mengalami kematian dalam keinginan untuk menjadi lebih kuat. Tapi ketika saya membuka mata saya, itu modern. Dunia telah berubah dan kita terhubung dengan dunia fantasi Pangaea?! Dan sebagai pengembalian dengan satu-satunya kelas? Mari gores tiket lotere!

altTitles.en: Don't Mess With the Film Club!

altTitles.ja: 映像研には手を出すな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Eizouken ni wa Te o Dasu na!
Eizouken ni ha Te wo Dasu na!

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!
___
**Additional Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Anime Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)
- [Official Anime Website](http://eizouken-anime.com/)
- [Official Live-Action Website](https://eizouken-saikyo.com/)

altTitles.ja: 年年百暗殺恋歌
ねんがらねんびゃくあんさつれんか

altTitles.en: All Year Round, Assassination Love Song

description.en: The Haiboshi family's line of work is assassination. Takatori, their princess, picks up a boy named Raika who swore to dedicate everything.

title.en: The Reincarnated Assassin Is a Swordmaster

altTitles.es-la: El asesino reencarnado es un genio de la espada

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Assassin is a Genius Swordsman

description.en:
Raon was once a loyal assassin for House Robert until Derus killed him. Not willing to give up, Raon prayed for vengeance and woke as a member of House Sieghart, the most powerful noble house!

He’ll need all of their near-infinite resources to get revenge. Though he carried over knowledge of a powerful Flame Link technique, he also carries the Curse of Bitter Frost, something that’s slowly killing him.

As if that weren’t enough, the demonic embodiment of Wrath is trying to take over his body!?
description.zh:
拉昂的一生就像一条拴着锁链的狗。
然而，造化弄人，他获得了新生
--即使他的怒火依然留在断裂的锁链之中。
终于能够自立，他决定按照自己的意愿生活。
“我会杀死一切阻挡我的人，神也不例外。”

altTitles.ja: 魔王様、リトライ! R

description.en: At the lowest floor of the dungeon, the Demon Lord came face to face with a presence that appears to be the creator of this world. His next destination is the demon territory where there's an ongoing rivalry between devils. A new, incredibly energetic and cheerful high school girl has joined the gang. Once again, our character's bustling personalities and their idiosyncrasies will clash with each other.
description.ja: ダンジョンの最下層部にて、この世界の創造主と思しき存在を目の当たりにした魔王が、次に向かう先は大悪魔たちが群雄割拠する魔族領。底抜けに明るい元気っ娘・JKも新たに仲間に加わり、今回も濃厚すぎるキャラたちの個性がぶつかり合う。
description.pt-br: Entrando em uma nova série! A aventura do lorde demônio mais forte está longe de terminar. No andar mais baixo da masmorra, o Lorde Demônio ficou cara a cara com uma presença que parece ser a criadora deste mundo. Seu próximo destino é o território demoníaco, onde há uma rivalidade contínua entre demônios. Uma nova, incrivelmente enérgica e alegre colegial se juntou à gangue. Mais uma vez, as personalidades agitadas do nosso personagem e suas idiossincrasias irão colidir umas com as outras. A aguardada sequência cômica de uma adaptação em quadrinhos da fantasia popular, cheia de mal-entendidos!

altTitles.ja: Minamike
みなみけ
南家

description.en:
*Minami-ke* ("The Minami Household") is a manga following the three Minami sisters, Haruka, Kana, and Chiaki in their lives at home and school. It's a funny manga that depicts how these characters interact with each other and their classmates. Although they are ordinary girls, their ordinary adventures are told in an extraordinary manner.
**Source:** MangaUpdates

altTitles.en: Convenience Store Worker From Another World

description.en: The protagonist Chan, who was looking for a part-time job after his previous company went bankrupt, coincidentally discovers a convenience store. Lured by the very high hourly wage, he decides to become a part-timer from that day. But the customers who come in seem a bit strange. Vampires, kobolds, and even succubi??
description.pt-br: O protagonista Chan, que estava procurando um trabalho de meio período depois que sua empresa anterior faliu, descobre por acaso uma loja de conveniência. Atraído pelo salário por hora extremamente alto, ele decide começar a trabalhar lá a partir daquele dia. Mas os clientes que entram parecem um pouco estranhos. Vampiros, kobolds e até succubus??

altTitles.ja: 飛雷刀

description.en:
A young orphan was alone in the world until he meets the master of a secret form of martial arts. To learn these otherworldly techniques, he will need to endure years of his sadistic teacher’s grueling and weird training. But why does he have to do laundry, cook meals, or play instruments to learn martial arts anyway?! If he can survive long enough (and if his massive ego doesn’t get in the way), he just might be able to wield the unstoppable lightning knives. Will he make the cut or be sliced down to size?

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlMScBLMT0U)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%84%EB%A2%B0%EB%8F%84/2355)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/52248)
description.ja:
5歳の時母親が亡くなり、10歳の時伝染病で父親まで亡くなった少年「飛雲」。彼は彫刻家だった父からその才能を受け継いでいた。 両親の木像を作り、二人の墓の前にそなえたある日、それを見た老人から「自分を師匠にすれば天下一の武術を教えよう」と話しかけられる。怪しいとは思ったものの老人が見せた武術に惹かれその申し出を受けてしまった飛雲。案の定、武術などろくに教えず、訓練といいながら家事と金稼ぎばかり… そんなある日、女装して働いている酒楼で偶然武林盟主の娘である「羅 香凜」の命を救った。飛雲は男であることを隠して香凜と親しくなるが…

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlMScBLMT0U)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%84%EB%A2%B0%EB%8F%84/2355)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/52248)
description.ko:
홀로 길러주신 아버지를 돌림병으로 잃고 10세의 어린 나이에 혈혈단신이 된 비류연.
조각가였던 아버지에게 배운 기술로 부모님의 조각상을 만들어 두 분의 묘 앞에 세워두는데,
지나가던 노인이 그걸 보더니 자신을 사부로 삼으면 천하제일 무공을 가르쳐주겠다고 한다.

수상쩍지만 달리 갈 곳도 없고, 그럴듯해 보이는 무공에 혹해 비류연은 그를 따라가고 마는데…

그날 이후 비류연을 길러준 것은 팔할이 바람이었다.

오늘 하루는 좀 편안했으면 좋겠다는 바람!
사부가 더 늙으면 울 때까지 구박해주겠다는 바람!
아니 다 필요 없고 여기서 탈출하고 싶다는 바람!
하늘이여 저한테 왜 이러세요 제발 살려주세요… 하는 바람!

하늘이 비류연의 바람을 들어준 것일까.
무식한 가사노동과 피골상접 과로사를 야기할 것 같던 돈벌이로 점철된 삶 속에서
깨알같이 사부 몰래 힘을 비축하던 비류연은 드디어 어느 날 깨닫는다.

‘오늘이 바로 그날이다!’

사부를 따돌릴 꿀떡(?)을 던져놓고는 무한한 용기를 발휘해 묵금과 비뢰도까지 다 들고 튄 비류연.

혹자는 강호를 두고 시산혈해 위에 암투로 쌓아올린 백척간두의 세계라고 하나,
비류연에겐 드넓은 꿀 천지에 온실 속의 화초들이 노니는 안락한 신세계로만 보였는데…!

비류연의 행복은 과연 언제까지 갈 것인가!

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlMScBLMT0U)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%84%EB%A2%B0%EB%8F%84/2355)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/52248)
description.ru:
В 10 лет Би Рю Ён становится сиротой, потеряв последнего родственника, своего отца.

Будучи хорошим сыном и отличным подмастерьем весьма талантливого ремесленника, он решает соорудить две прекрасные статуи в память о своих родителях. Так, когда работа была практически завершена, к нему неожиданно обратился некий старый мастер, пожелав стать наставником парня, и обещая обучить самому могущественному искусству во всей Поднебесной.

Жажда до силы превозмогает сомнения. И он решает последовать за стариком… 

С этого момента... жизнь круто изменилась. Невыносимые тренировки и серьезные наказания следовали по пятам день за днём! Иногда казалось, труд настолько изматывал мальчика, что кожа прилипала к костям, а смерть от переутомления уже маячила на горизонте. Много раз Рю Ён хотел бросить всё и покинуть наставника. Возгласы, «О Небо, за что мне всё это?! Кто-нибудь, спасите меня!» - не сходили с его уст. Но Небеса оставались безмолвны.

И вот, в один из множества преисполненных изнеможением и страданиями дней, когда сил осталось с кунжутное зёрнышка, он понял: «Это оно!»

Сегодня Рю Ён превзойдёт своего учителя и узнает, что такое "Меч разящего грома".

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlMScBLMT0U)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%84%EB%A2%B0%EB%8F%84/2355)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/52248)

altTitles.ja: 大室家

description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

altTitles.ja: 7年後で待ってる

description.en:
To regain a piece of my lost memory and to fulfill the promise I made that day I came back to this town.
This is the story of the main character "Haruto" who has lost his childhood memories, and his attempt to regain his missing memories and only remaining "promise to a girl whose face and name he does not know."

note: The hit game with over 6 million downloads has been adapted into a comic book!

altTitles.ja: 一人だけレベルアップします！

description.en:
Living in a world infested with monsters is hard enough, but doing it without powers? That’s Hanyeol’s life in a nutshell.

Fearsome beasts roam the earth and kill everyone in their path. Elite members of society called the Awakened mobilize to protect humanity with their supernatural abilities. Amidst it all, Hanyeol is just a poor porter, tasked as sideline support.

But when a benevolent being gifts him with special abilities, he’s ready to harvest all the loot and take it to the next level!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.podoteng.com/)
description.ja:
次元ゲートから侵入したモンスターの襲撃により、絶体絶命の危機に陥った地球。 そこに現れた謎の男と「多次元宇宙連盟」への加入を約束すると、 モンスターに匹敵する超人的な力を持った「覚醒者（ハンター）」が各地に現れ、彼らの活躍により地球は危機を脱したのだが… それから28年後、ポーターとしてハンターを援護していた最上烈（もがみ れつ）は守護者カビスの出現により、突然覚醒しハンターとなる!　 …がしかし!?烈は経験がスキルになり、モンスターとの戦いでレベルアップする「ユニークハンター」だった‼　 無限の可能性を秘めたユニークハンター烈の挑戦が今、始まる!!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%98%BC%EC%9E%90-%EB%A0%88%EB%B2%A8%EC%97%85-%ED%95%A9%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2430)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.podoteng.com/)
description.ko:
짐꾼으로 일하던 한열. 
오매불망 기다리던 각성과 함께 헌터가 되다!
그런데 이게 웬일? 

몬스터를 잡아서 레벨업을 하고, 
행동을 통해 스킬을 획득하라고?

************************************************************
신필 작가님의 인기 웹소설 <혼자 레벨업 합니다>을 웹툰으로 만나보세요!
************************************************************

description.ru:
Ханьёль работал носильщиком. Однако после долгожданного пробуждения он становится охотником. Как быть? Ему предстоит ловить монстров, тем самым повышая свой уровень и улучшая навыки.

title.en: Sekai o Horobosu Majo o Sodatemasu!!

altTitles.en: Let's Raise a Witch Who Will Destroy the World

altTitles.ja: 世界を滅ぼす魔女を育てます!!

description.en: Takeru, a “Nurturer,” who was born into a family that trains monsters. To make money, he accepts requests from the Demon King and works hard to raise vicious monsters. One night, a wounded witch visits him and asks him to train Anna, a young girl. In fact, Anna is the last survivor of a legendary witch family… Will a bond be formed between Anna, whose ultimate goal is to destroy the world, and Takeru, the best “Nurturer” in the demon world? What will become of the world?

altTitles.th: ชายเลวหมื่นลี้ทานตะวัน

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロイン救済計画

description.en:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
description.fr:
Su Lüxia fait partie d'un "Système de rôle féminin".
Sa mission : en se téléportant dans les corps des femmes trompées et bafouées, elle renverse leur destinée.
"Seules les larmes d'un bâtard de tricheur et les gémissements de douleur d'une garce m'apportent le réconfort."
description.it:
Schiacciare un verme per un solo momento dà una soddisfazione momentanea, ma le vite passate a schiacciare i vermi forniscono vite di soddisfazione continua. Su Lüxia, la nostra protagonista femminile, trasmigra in altri mondi con il sistema di contrattacco della seconda protagonista femminile; usa schemi e trucchi elaborati per picchiare innumerevoli bastardi traditori e puttane.

Su Lüxia: "Solo le lacrime di rimorso di un bastardo traditore, e i gemiti di dolore di una puttana incapace di ottenere ciò che vuole, mi danno conforto."

Sistema: "Il mio ospite ha attinto alla sua umanità oggi? No."

altTitles.ja: シノニム

description.en: The manga centers on Yano, a virgin boy who dreams of success as an erotic manga artist. One day, he encounters a totally naked palm-sized girl.
description.ja: エロ漫画家として成功を夢みる専門学生・矢野。彼の前に突然、手のひらサイズの美少女が現れる。漫画賞を目指したいのに、俺の弁当に何かいるんです！

altTitles.ja: 残り火の騎士

altTitles.th: เพลิงแค้นของอัศวิน

description.en:
When Nagyunn’s twin brother, Najin, is murdered before his very eyes, he vows to avenge his brother’s death by assuming Najin’s identity. 

But although the two may look alike, when it comes to fighting, Nagyunn lacks the talent and skill his brother possessed. In order to successfully execute his plot for revenge, Nagyunn resolves to train himself to become the prodigious knight-in-training his brother once was. 

Will Nagyunn be able to keep his identity a secret before others begin to catch on to his act?

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SC46p8Zh2g4)
---
- [Official English <Tappytoon> Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-ember-knight)

死んだ弟の復讐のため最弱の兄が立ち上がる

description.ko:
유일한 가족이자, 최고의 기사 유망주였던 쌍둥이 동생이 살해당했다.
천재적이었던 동생과는 달리 무예에 재능이 전혀 없지만,
동생의 복수를 위해 '강함'을 연기하기로 결심했다.
약해빠진 나는 복수에 성공할 수 있을까.

description.ru:
Мой брат-близнец, единственный член семьи, восходящая звезда и главный кандидат на становление рыцарем, был убит. В отличие от него, у меня совсем не было таланта к боевым искусствам. Однако ради того, чтобы отомстить за своего брата, я должен стать сильнее.

description.th:
น้องชายฝาแฝดของฉันเป็นผู้เข้าสอบอัศวินที่เก่งที่สุดในประเทศถูกลอบสังหาร ฉันซึ่งไม่มีความสามารถในการต่อสู้เลยนั้น ตัดสินใจแล้วว่าจะแกล้งปลอมตัวเป็นน้องชายที่แข็งแกร่งของฉันเพื่อแก้แค้นแทนเขา ตัวฉันที่อ่อนแอจะสามารถแก้แค้นคนที่ฆ่าน้องชายของฉันได้หรือไม่

description.zh:
弟弟是最强骑士却被杀害？
软弱的我为复仇假扮弟弟！
某天，洛辰洛谦两兄弟家里来了一伙神秘人，他们企图杀害弟弟洛辰。洛辰是整个大陆最有实力的预备骑士，而洛谦却是一个手无缚鸡之力的少年。危机时刻洛辰为了保护哥哥丧命于家中。哥哥洛谦为了查明真相，找出真凶，于是假扮成弟弟成为了一名骑士。但哥哥洛谦并没有骑士资质，他只能依靠伪装骗过众人，同时寻找神秘人为弟弟报仇。软弱的洛谦可以成功找到真相为弟弟复仇吗？

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SC46p8Zh2g4)

altTitles.ja: お忍び同棲

description.en: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

altTitles.ja: シュガーガール・ドリップ

description.en: Marie, a sparkling university student who craves validation, takes up a part-time job at a concept cafe for their uniforms. There, she meets Akira, a spontaneous and unpredictable person. Their meeting sets off a chain of events that changes Marie's life, and they end up spending time together as…accomplices!? An overdose of desire begins in the neon-glowing sleepless city!!
description.ja: 承認欲求あふれるキラキラ大学生インフルエンサーのマリーは制服目当てでダイナーのコンセプトカフェでバイトをすることに。そこで地雷系キッズのアキと出会ったことで、人生を一変する大事件を起こし、共犯者としてともに過ごすこととなり…!?　ネオン輝く眠らない街で欲望のオーバードーズが始まる!!

title.en: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.ja: クセ強彼女は床にいざなう

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo ha Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.en: A Quirky Girl is Inviting Me to Bed

description.en: Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on. The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?
description.ja: 一浪して大学に合格した青年・木吉直人。上京のために住める場所を探していたところ、親戚で憧れの姉・月(ルナ)の家で同棲することに。 昔憧れていた月は垢ぬけて、美しく成長し…そして…ビッチになっていた!?夜な夜なあられもない嬌声を聞き、モンモンとする直人。他の男性がいる割に距離感もめちゃくちゃ近い。何を考えているか分からない月に翻弄され、さらに月以外のエッチで癖が強い女の子たちも集まりだし…!?
description.pt-br:
De repente estou morando com a garota mais velha por quem eu tinha uma queda!? Ainda mais, estou começando a suspeitar que ela é uma vagabunda!?

Naoto Kiyoshi é um jovem que acabou de entrar na universidade depois de ser reprovado nos exames de admissão um ano antes. Quando ele estava procurando um lugar para morar para poder se mudar para Tóquio, ele se viu morando com Luna, uma parente e garota mais velha por quem ele tinha uma queda.

A Luna que ele admirava no passado era arrumada, bonita e madura... e agora ela aparentemente se tornou uma vagabunda!? Noite após noite, ele ouve seus gemidos sedutores e pouco femininos, e isso está deixando Naoto excitado. Há também outros homens de quem ela é irracionalmente próxima além dele. Luna, cujos pensamentos ele não conseguia entender, está o levando pelo nariz! Além disso, outras mulheres com peculiaridades obscenas além de Luna também se reuniram lá!?

Este é o início de sua nova vida emocionante cercado por garotas mais velhas safadas(?)!

altTitles.ja: 天使だった幼なじみ、再会したらギャルだった

altTitles.ja-ro: Tenshi datta Osananajimi, Saikai Shitara Gyaru datta

altTitles.en: My Angel Childhood Friend was a Gal When We Met Again

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染BIGLOVE

altTitles.pt-br: Minha Amiga de Infância Era um Anjo, Mas Quando Nos Reencontramos, Ela Se Tornou uma Gyaru.

description.en: I once had a childhood friend who was an angel. However, when we met again, several years later, she had become a gyaru. A yuri story between two childhood friends.
description.ja: 天使だった幼なじみ、再会したらギャルだった幼なじみの２人の百合です

altTitles.ja: カードファイト!! ヴァンガードスカイライド

description.en:
A single encounter with a card will take you to the skies!
The Card Game that Soars through the Skies, this is Vanguard's New series, 'SkyRide'!
